title: U.S. Refugee Program Ignores Dangers Children Face, Critics Say
teaser: The White House has been trying to stem the flow of unaccompanied children into the U.S. from Mexico. Steve Inskeep talks to Human Rights Watch's Bill Felick and the State Department's Simon Henshaw.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
